content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” content_text_aligment=”center”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1564987402743{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;}” el_class=”mobile-padding mobile-column”]

Let’s celebrate your small business’ success

[vc_column_text]

At Confetti Design, we specialise in branding and small business web design services in the Melbourne and Bayside area.

Our primary purpose is to help small businesses get known online by making the process easy and affordable – but not at the expense of quality.

We are partners in your success. Once your beautiful site is live we continue to support you with sound digital marketing and SEO services.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”] Read More About Us

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515597706190{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Clarity-Process-Bonus-Section-Confetti-Design_edited2-.jpg?id=11175) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”200px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1515585983820{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;}”][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”200px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” el_class=”text-white”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1516685262799{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/home-branding-bg.jpg?id=11009) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1547362415492{padding-top: 30% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 30% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

BRANDING

Authentic, aligned brand identities to attract the right customers for you.
Logo’s, product packaging, brochures, brand identities.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1516685322526{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/website-design-bayside-websites-Confetti-Design-dark-.jpg?id=10640) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1547362300527{padding-top: 30% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 30% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

WEBSITES

Websites designed to be enthralling, functional and work hard to sell your business.
Wordpress website design, Shopify online stores, membership sites.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” el_class=”text-white”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1516685352461{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/website-design-bayside-Start-your-business-right-course-Confetti-Design-dark.jpg?id=10639) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517649997268{padding-top: 30% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 30% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

BUSINESS CLARITY PROCESS

Gain insights into your business and customers to establish a brand they will love

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1501147493319{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/website-design-bayside-copywriting-Confetti-Design-dark_.jpg?id=10637) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1530445104707{padding-top: 30% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 30% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

SEO & COPYWRITING THAT SELLS

On-point website content, blogs, newsletters and more to entice and engage. SEO to support your copy and help you get found.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1501147501071{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/website-design-bayside-digital-support-Confetti-Design-dark-.jpg?id=10638) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517650064725{padding-top: 30% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 30% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

DIGITAL SUPPORT

Lean on our network of talented collaborators in graphic design, social media, videography, photography, marketing and website maintenance

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” el_class=”mobile-section”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1564986822254{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”mobile-padding”]

The Confetti Design difference - discover our Business Clarity Process

The Clarity Process is a questionnaire that is both thorough and thought-provoking. It helps us uncover all your brand values, goals, and business missions whilst putting your customer at the forefront of all your strategic and service decisions. Many might call it a brief, but to us, it’s the magic piece of the puzzle that ensures your designs are perfectly aligned to help you grow your business.

[vc_empty_space] Discover more about our Clarity Process
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1564990253934{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep mobile-padding”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1564990260944{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Our small business web design portfolio

[vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Explore some of our projects and get in touch today if you’re looking for web design in Melbourne for your small business.

“How you present yourself online is a vital part of your customer experience. Our role as designers is to think about your positioning and your customer so that first impression is compelling and leads to potential new business for you. We do this by offering the best possible brand and small business website design services.”
Johannah Barton, founder of Confetti Design

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1564986849081{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]
